section1.title: 服务
section1.description: Removes car images on the road using the deep learning technique and drone-taken images.

section1.title: CAR-FREE STREET MAPPING
section1.description: Removes car images on the road using the deep learning technique and drone-taken images.

section2.title: 3D MODELING
section2.description: Creates 2.5D to 3D models from the drone-taken images using the multi-directional cameras.

section3.title: HD SAFETY MAPPING
section3.description: Creates simulation data for autonomous vehicles by gathering road information such as crosswalk, center line, and stop lines from real drone-taken images.

section4.title: AUTOMATIC DATA PROCESSING
section4.description: Distributes data processing step using the Node to automate the processing.

section1.description:
Based on CfSM, it removes cars using deep learning algorithms,
and those integrated images are combined to make car-free street maps.
Also, it could be used for self-driving car simulation data
with the real road information and HD Safety Map.

Makes HTML5-based results from several images going through 360° Panoramic platform and a real-time auto-process (with mosaic and color correction process, etc.), which automatically sends the result to users in any OS & device.
